definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: 1547- Ivan the Terrible was crowned Czar of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 1547年的今天，伊凡雷帝加冕爲俄國沙皇。

sentences.english: It was built by Czar Ivan the Terrible in the mid-16th century.
sentences.chinese: 它是由“恐怖的沙皇伊凡”於16世紀中葉所建。

sentences.english: Welcome back, Evangeline. You look well. Are you well?
sentences.chinese: 歡迎回來伊凡吉琳你看起來很好你還好嗎？

sentences.english: "I'd know him any where," said Ivan.
sentences.chinese: “他走到哪裏我都能認出他，”伊凡說。

sentences.english: Here are also some of the Ivan the Terrible’s clothes, very rare thing.
sentences.chinese: 這有些伊凡恐怖時期穿的衣服，十分的罕見。

sentences.english: Here you can see two works written during the Ivan the Terrible’s governing.
sentences.chinese: 此時，您能夠看到在伊凡恐怖執政時期兩部作品。

sentences.english: "Easy, " says Ivan. "You stand in front of a cave and whistle.
sentences.chinese: “簡單，”伊凡說，“你站在一個洞前並吹哨子。
他走到哪兒我都能認出他，“伊凡說。”

sentences.english: Kinfolk come to see Yvonne by the dozen.
Ivan the Terrible commissioned the cathedral in the mid-16th century.
sentences.chinese: 在16世紀中期，伊凡四世下令修建這個教堂。

sentences.english: Ivan the Terrible commissioned the iconic building in the mid-16th century.
sentences.chinese: 16世紀中期，伊凡四世建立了這座標誌性的建築。

sentences.english: Russians are, Ivan de terrible is one such person.
sentences.chinese: 俄國沙皇伊凡雷帝就是這樣一個人。

sentences.english: Who remembers the names now of the boyars Ivan the Terrible got rid of? No one.
sentences.chinese: 還有誰記得被伊凡雷帝消滅的貴族叫啥名啥？

sentences.english: Ivan the Terrible, the first to assume the title of ´Tsar´, was crowned.
sentences.chinese: 伊凡雷帝加冕，成爲俄國第一個稱沙皇的君主。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
